title: There’s No Avoiding This Fight Anymore (Ep 1294)
description:
In this episode, I address the disgusting cancel culture trend and why we should ALL be concerned. I also address the growing tyranny brewing in the coronavirus era. 

News Picks:

You can take your mask mandate and shove it up your a%^! 

Cancel culture is coming for the books now.


Judicial Watch sued to paint a message on a DC street.

The simple act of dating a Republican can get you cancelled now?

Joe Biden trashes the police. Again.


NYPD retirements are surging as liberals double-down on attacks on the police.
